attributes.action: stop the go ahead to teach over fives sex education stop taking charge of our children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Conduct a 12 week public
consultation regarding whether or not to make sex and relationship education
a statutory requirement for children five years old and over, expressing
regret that this did not take place before the decision was announced by Jim
Knight on October 23rd"
why is it we have children and are not allowed to bring them up the right way i have no criminal record neither does my wife but we are told how to bring up our children,i say let the children be children not little robots.you got were you are because you wanted to not because you forced to.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
